mapper.select: SELECT memberid, name, nickname FROM member b1, ( SELECT other_id,MAX(chat_no) max_no FROM ( SELECT sender other_id, chat_no FROM chat_list WHERE receiver=#{memberid} UNION ALL SELECT receiver other_id, chat_no FROM chat_list WHERE sender=#{memberid} ) GROUP BY other_id ) b2 WHERE b1.memberid=b2.other_id ORDER BY max_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_list (CONTENTS, RECEIVER, SENDER, send_date, chat_no) VALUES (#{contents}, #{receiver}, #{sender},#{send_date}, chat_list_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: SELECT memberid, nickname FROM member WHERE memberid != #{memberid} AND ( memberid LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR nickname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
